node.detail_zh: 患者為耆康會啟業護理安老院院友，無外遊記錄，沒有病徵。患者於 8 月 9 日因咳嗽入院接受治療，延至 8 月 28 日上午 7 時 54 分離世。
node.detail_en: The patient is a resident at SAGE Kai Yip Home for the Elderly, with no travel history and having exhibited no symptoms. He was hospitalized 9 Aug due to cought and passed away on 28 Aug at 7.54 a.m.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_zh: 耆康會啟業護理安老院
groups.name_en: The Hong Kong Society For The Aged Kai Yip Home For The Elderly
groups.description_zh: 6 名院友確診，群組首名患者在 8 月 5 日發燒送院。
groups.description_en: 6 residents of the elderly home tested positive. The first individual in the cluster to be diagnosed was hospitalized on Aug 5 due to fever.

node.location_en: Kai Shing House, Kai Yip Estate
node.remarks_zh: 耆康會啟業護理安老院
node.remarks_en: The Hong Kong Society For The Aged Kai Yip Home For The Elderly
